meanings.sent1: His schnoz was so big, it cast a shadow on his face.
meanings.sent2: The clown had a bright red schnoz that honked when squeezed.
meanings.sent3: The schnoz on the statue was comically oversized, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her schnoz was like a beacon, guiding lost souls with its size.
meanings.sent5: The schnoz on the cartoon character was as big as a watermelon, impossible to miss.

meanings.sent1: The dog schnozed around the park, searching for treats.
meanings.sent2: She schnozed the flowers to enjoy their sweet scent.
meanings.sent3: He schnozed the air cautiously, trying to detect any danger.
meanings.sent4: The chef schnozed the soup to check if it needed more seasoning.
meanings.sent5: The detective schnozed the crime scene for any clues, his keen sense of smell aiding him.
